comment.author: 59523315@N00
comment._content: Hilarious. Making the red cross of St George black makes the studio prop Union Flag look more like the German battle Flag without the eagle than the British. The sense of heightened unreality is accented by placing the red (or rather black) cross of St Patrick in the wrong position. The general effect is unsettling because their is a gap of a second between looking at the picture and realising what is wrong with it. A marvellously surreal image that invites us to enter into an alternative history of Britain.
